PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.ALSA_SELECTION_DOC:
Modular alsa: used standard alsa pipeline
DSD native: Peppymeter use a separate output pipeline and does not affect the audio pipe
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.SPOTIFY_DOC: Redirect Spotify audio to use it also with PeppyMeter
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.DSP_DOC:
Adjusting the audio pipe for FusionDSP.
- DSD-native is not more supported in this mode (reformat to PCM)
- Spotify no longer needs special treatment
- Attention, only enable this option, if DSP is active!
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.TIMEOUT_DOC:
Timeout in seconds until Peppymeter screensaver starts.

Please set follow options in Touch Display plugin:
- The standard screensaver timeout in TouchScreen plugin should be set higher as than for PeppyMeter
-
- 'No Screensaver while playing' to 'ON'
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.VUMETER_DESC: Available meters are depend on selected 'Active Meter Folder'
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.METER_DOC: Select one VU-Meter of active meter folder
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.LIST_EMPTY: No VU-Meters in list. Revert back to random mode!
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.RANDOMMODE_DOC: Switch of meters randomly on a defined timer interval or on change of music title
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.RANDOMSELECTION_DOC:
Comma separated list of meter names for using, if 'List' selected.
Available meter list for copy and paste:
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.RANDOMINTERVAL_DOC: Time interval until the next meter is displayed
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.NEEDLE_CACHE_DOC: A Raspberry with 1GB RAM and a display resolution of 1920x1080 or 1280x800 is hard at the memory limit. Therefore the cache has to be switched off, in order to save memory. Otherwise, no random or list mode is possible
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.ACTIVE_FOLDER_DOC: Selection of the actively used folder for VU-Meter depend on screen resolution
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.MOUSE_DOC: For a touchscreen enable the mouse support, to have the possibility to stop the screensaver per touch. For a standard HDMI display without touch disable this option
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.DISPLAY_OUTPUT_DOC: Per default is display port 0 used on a raspberry pi for both hdmi ports. Volumio Primo use display port 1
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.INFO_MIN: The value has been adjusted to the lowest possible because the value entered is too small.
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.INFO_MAX: The value has been adjusted to the highest possible because the value entered is too big.
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.NAN: : La valeur précédente a été conservée car la valeur saisie n'est pas un nombre.
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.NO_PEPPYCONFIG: No PeppyMeter 'config.txt' found. Cannot read and save settings!
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.UNINSTALL_MSG: Please restart the system, when unistallation is complete
PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.MPD_CHANGED_REBOOT: In order to change the alsa pipeline, a reboot is required

PEPPY_SCREENSAVER.NODSPWARNING: For a correct functionality please disable the PeppyMeter integration or enable FusionDsp.
